reviewText:
I know Pam personally having been introduced to her from a dear friend who cherishes the Master Training she has received from Pam.  Pam works directly from her heart to teach people non violence to co-create a world of peace.  I highly recommend her video's as a way to empower yourself in the comfort of your home and at your own convenience.  Together we ALL make a difference!

Suzanne Kincaid,
Author, Financial Freedom on $1 a Day
